New Records: Nikola Jokic achieved the first game of 20+p, 15+r, & 15+a in under 30 MIN in NBA HISTORY
Key Match Events: The Nuggets scored 40 points in the first quarter but couldnâ€™t shake Atlanta, which rallied from down nine early in the second quarter to lead 62-57 with 4:53 left in the period
The Nuggets took control with a dominant third quarter
Christian Braun, who had 15 points, converted a three-point play, Murray made a technical free throw and Porter hit another 3-pointer to make it 91-79, forcing an Atlanta timeout
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets swept the two games of the season series
Nikola Jokic had 14th triple-double of the season and third in four games
Others: Russell Westbrook had 16 points and 11 assists and Michael Porter Jr. and Jamal Murray contributed 21 points each for the Nuggets
